CustomField.description: All requirements will be entered into the system for each distinct area of Scope. Requirements that are not applicable will be assessed as "Not Applicable". This will allow reporting of non-applicable requirements that can be reviewed for validity with the CISO office. In addition, it shows that all requirements were considered, not forgotten or missed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The selected Requirement is applicable to the scope of this assessment
CustomField.label: Applicable
